reject_unauthorized.title: Enable certificate validation
reject_unauthorized.description: Enable certificate validation for the GitLab server

groups.title: Groups list
groups.description: List of GitLab groups from which to fetch data. If none passed, all visible groups for the authenticated user will be used.

excluded_groups.title: Excluded Groups list
excluded_groups.description: List of GitLab groups from which data won't be fetched. By default, no groups are excluded. If groups list is specified, this list will be ignored.

use_faros_graph_repos_selection.title: Use Faros Graph for Repositories selection
use_faros_graph_repos_selection.description: Use Faros Graph for selecting which repositories should be fetched (Faros credentials are required).

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Only fetch data updated in the last number of days

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: Page size to use when querying GitLab REST APIs

api_key.title: Faros API Key
api_key.description: The Faros API key to use to access the API.

bucket_id.title: Bucket Number
bucket_id.description: Bucket number for this source to determine which portion of groups to pull. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources.

bucket_total.title: Total Number of Buckets
bucket_total.description: Total number of buckets to distribute groups across. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources
